column8: A plan is assigned 4 stars if it does not meet the 5 star criteria, but meets at least one of these two criteria: (a) the plan’s average CAHPS measure score is higher than the 70th percentile OR (b) the plan’s average CAHPS measure score is statistically significantly higher than the national average CAHPS measure score.
